snippet: SIEGMAN--Felix, M.D. The Medical Staff of Maimonides Medical Center is deeply saddened by the death of Dr. Felix Siegman. He was a surgeon associated with Maimonides Medical Center for 69 years. He did his training here and continued his lifetime ...
lead_paragraph:
SIEGMAN--Felix, M.D.

The Medical Staff of Maimonides Medical Center is deeply saddened by the death of Dr. Felix Siegman. He was a surgeon associated with Maimonides Medical Center for 69 years. He did his training here and continued his lifetime work at Maimonides He was a surgeon par excellence. He taught the interns and residents how to become surgeons. He was the Division Chairman of the Vascular Surgery Department for many years. He was President of the Medical Staff in the late seventies. He was always available to give his wisdom to others. Everyone at the Medical Center had such respect for him because he always treated others with respect and a smile. He will be sorely missed by all his colleagues and friends. Sincere condolences are extended to his entire family. George Neiderman, M.D. President Edward Chapnick , M.D. President-Elect Harry Adler, M.D. Secretary Abraham Taub, M.D. Treasurer
